steps.title: Find the file.
steps.content: Find the file. Look for the main application that runs on opening the program. Use Properties --> File Target/Open File Location.

steps.title: Look for the file's backup such as one ending in .bak.
steps.content: Look for the file's backup such as one ending in .bak. Make a copy of the original file in case the backup fails to work.

steps.title: Rename the .Bak file.
steps.content: Rename the .Bak file. Remove the ".Bak part." If there is no preceding .exe, add one. After doing this, the original icon should be available and the program should start working as the original.
